data.title: Nicolas Bichot
data.meta_description: Nicolas Bichot is a highly respected French corporate lawyer with a significant breadth of experience in corporate, transactional and regulatory work.
data.text:
Mr. Bichot advises French and international entrepreneurs, corporate and institutional clients on the full range of transactional matters, from the negotiation of acquisitions, LBOâ€™s, strategic partnerships and joint ventures, to reorganizations, by way of mergers, spin-offs or other forms of transfer of assets, including in the context of restructuring. He has considerable experience with corporate and securities as well as stock exchange regulation in France.

Mr. Bichot is recognized for the breadth of his corporate law expertise by Legal 500 France 2020.
